Hotels.name: The Vale Resort
Hotels.text: Free parking on site. Bed & Breakfast rate. Free access to facilities during stay. Free shuttle to and from Hensol Castle. Rooms available to book via https://www.valeresort.com/ or by calling 01443 667800

Hotels.name: Llantrisant Inn
Hotels.text: Free parking on site. 15 minute taxi ride from Hensol Castle. Rooms available to book via https://www.premierinn.com/gb/en/hotels/wales/glamorgan/llantrisant/llantrisant.html
